Articles.Content:
He isn't finished 100% but I wanted to share him anyway. I've got other things to do, maybe someone can give him some nice moves and teach him how to walk. Any stupid things you might find: bear with me, it's my first robot.

And no, this one will not transform. Parts list is already at 560. Maybe after 1.1.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Mods:

Infernal Robotics Model Rework - Core Pack

KerbPaint

TweakScale - Rescale Everything!

Download link:

http://kerbalx.com/crafts/5914

Joints available:

Jaw

Neck pitch & rotate

torso pitch & rotate

hips pitch & rotate

knees

feet

shoulder all directions

elbow pitch & rotate

wrist pitch & rotate

all fingers, 2 digits

48 joints total.

5 fuel cell arrays

4 fuel tanks.

Have fun!

Edited October 7, 2015 by Azimech
You might want to list the mods, It's very impressive, I have no idea how much work it takes though, though 560 parts is always going to be hard.
I will. Also, KerbalX automaticaly lists all of them.

Mod crafts are underrated :3

It's huge and accurate!

Incredible work!! Rep!

Edited October 8, 2015 by castille7
